name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce, served with naan.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Marinated paneer cubes grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.

name: Masala Dosa
description: A crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato filling, served with sambar and coconut chutney.

name: Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender pieces of chicken and a blend of aromatic spices.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spiced chickpeas served with deep-fried bread, a popular North Indian dish.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in a tandoor oven, served with mint chutney.

name: Samosa
description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, served with tamarind chutney.

name: Rogan Josh
description: Tender lamb pieces cooked in a flavorful and aromatic curry sauce.

name: Pav Bhaji
description: Spicy vegetable mash served with buttered bread rolls, a popular street food.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Cubes of paneer cooked in a creamy spinach sauce, served with naan or rice.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Deep-fried dough balls soaked in a sweet syrup, a classic Indian dessert.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes, served with yogurt and pickle.

name: Matar Paneer
description: Paneer cubes and green peas cooked in a tomato-based gravy, served with naan or rice.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken pieces cooked in a spiced creamy tomato sauce, served with rice or naan.

name: Pani Puri
description: Crispy hollow puris filled with spicy and tangy water, tamarind chutney, and chickpeas.

name: Hyderabadi Dum Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with marinated meat and spices, served with raita.

name: Dal Makhani
description: Creamy black lentils cooked with butter and spices, served with naan or rice.

name: Kheer
description: A sweet rice pudding made with milk, sugar, and flavored with cardamom and nuts.
